# delegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate that receives updates on the collection of homes.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any HMHomeManagerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Keeping track of connected homes

- **HMHomeManagerDelegate**: An interface the home manager uses to communicate changes to the state of the home network.
